EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jianmin,
What is your phone number, I don’t seem to have it from the initial inquiry you placed in our system?
Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you at 3:00 today.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

I am in NJ and that time seems OK to me. Jianmin

From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners To: "Jianmin Zhao" <zhaojm1999@yahoo.com> Date: Monday, November 21, 2011, 3:47 PM Hi Jianmin,
I am available at 3:00pm EST tomorrow. Are you on the east coast? If so will that time work for you?
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
